resources.string: Welcome to Point and Click Adventure Game
You wake up in a dark room. Your eyes can\'t make out anything. However, after some time, you can begin to make some shapes out. Beside you is a table. What do you do\?

After a clumsy search in the dark, you manage to find a small candle and a lighter. Naturally, you fiddle long enough to light the candle. Now, you look around again. The room is cramped. Around you, there is a closet and a door. \n\nWhat do you do?
The door opens with a small creak and you exit through it.
You enter the main hallway of the place. It seems dilapidated. After checking around, you find three doors.
Upon opening the rusty door, you smell a myriad of scents. Most prominent is that of oil. Lighting your lighter reveals a generator inside. It is running.
You enter a very well kept room. There are many decorations. What do you do?
